metadata.name: Mixing Art & Business #1
metadata.description:
Mixing Art & Business #1 - Genesis.

"Clay Futurism" is a series of artworks are meant to remind everyone that we live in a fake world with so much unnecessary noise around us. Itâ€™s easy to get distracted by superficial shiny ideas, viral shitty content, and luxury stuff.

So just turn off all the noise around you and focus on the right things.

Dimensions: 1920 x 1080
Edition 1/2
